recipe_text: Measurement; 400; Measure out 400 grams of chickpeas, drained and rinsed| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of olive oil| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of chili powder| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of ground cumin| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of garlic powder| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of onion powder| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of salt| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of black pepper| Quantity; 8; Prepare 8 tortillas| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of lettuce, shredded| Measurement; 150; Measure out 150 grams of tomatoes, diced| Measurement; 150; Measure out 150 grams of avocado, sliced| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of sour cream| Untimed; None; Preheat oven to 200 degrees C (400 degrees F)| Untimed; None; In a bowl, toss chickpeas with olive oil, chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and black pepper| Untimed; None; Spread seasoned chickpeas on a baking sheet| Timed; 600; Roast in the preheated oven for 20 minutes| Untimed; None; Warm tortillas in a skillet or microwave| Untimed; None; Assemble tacos by filling tortillas with roasted chickpeas, lettuce, tomatoes, avocado, and sour cream| Finish; None; Serve immediately!
title: Vegetarian Chickpea Tacos
